projects.title: Budgetify - Personal Finance Manager
projects.description: Collaborative full-stack web application for personal finance management, developed as part of ALX Phase 2 requirements. Features include expense tracking, budget planning, financial analytics, and multi-user support. Built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and React.
projects.short_description: Full-stack finance management app with budget tracking and analytics
projects.technologies: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, React, JWT, REST API

projects.title: Real-time Log Parser
projects.description: Python-based system for processing and analyzing log data in real-time. Implements efficient regex patterns for parsing various log formats, statistical analysis, and alert generation. Handles large-scale log files with optimized memory usage.
projects.short_description: Python-based system for processing log data in real-time
projects.technologies: Python, Regex, Data Processing, File I/O

projects.title: Custom Shell Implementation
projects.description: Unix shell implementation in C with process management, built-in commands, and environment variable handling. Features include command execution, piping, input/output redirection, and signal handling. Demonstrates deep understanding of system calls and process control.
projects.short_description: Unix shell implementation in C with process management
projects.technologies: C, Unix Systems, System Calls, Process Management

projects.title: Monty ByteCode Interpreter
projects.description: Stack-based interpreter for Monty ByteCode files. Implements various stack and queue operations, mathematical operations, and control flow. Built with C, demonstrating proficiency in data structures and interpreter design patterns.
projects.short_description: Stack-based interpreter for Monty ByteCode files
projects.technologies: C, Data Structures, Interpreter Design, Stack/Queue
